## redirect() function

Factory function for easily generating a redirect response

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function redirect(location: string, statusCode?: number, extraHeaders?: OutgoingHttpHeaders): ResponseObject<null>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  location | <code>string</code> | URL to redirect to |
|  statusCode | <code>number</code> | Status code for response. Defaults to 302 |
|  extraHeaders | <code>OutgoingHttpHeaders</code> | Additional headers of the response |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ResponseObject<null>`

A redirect [response](./prismy.responseobject.md) to location
